## NotificationMessage interface

Component used for displaying notification message must implement this interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NotificationMessage<TCssClasses, TOptions extends NotificationMessageOptions<TCssClasses>> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [closed](./notifications.notificationmessage.closed.md) | <code>EventEmitter&lt;Notification&gt;</code> | Occurs when notification is closed by user |
|  [item](./notifications.notificationmessage.item.md) | <code>Notification</code> | Represents notification that will be displayed |
|  [options](./notifications.notificationmessage.options.md) | <code>TOptions</code> | Options used for notification message |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [invalidateVisuals()](./notifications.notificationmessage.invalidatevisuals.md) | Explicitly runs invalidation of content (change detection) |
